website_summaries.verdict: Nokia's Lumia 620 smartphone successfully delivers a complete Windows Phone 8 experience for a low price, but buyer beware of some compromises in battery, sound, and design.
pros: The Nokia Lumia 620 has a glare-cutting screen, a decent 5-megapixel camera, NFC, and an affordable price tag
cons: The Lumia 620 loses points for poor call quality, a short screen time-out, a small battery, and numerous design issues -- including a hard-to-find SIM card slot

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: I'm still getting used to this phone. The best feature on it so far is the turn by turn navigation. Other than that it is pretty cheaply made. If it drops on the floor the whole thing falls apart. The front and the back base separate. Sometimes the side buttons get stuck and I have to fuss with it and separate to get it going again. I like that I can add all my email account to the phone and that it has a connection to skydrive as well, but I'm not convinced it's the best phone out there.
customer_reviews.author: BuyerWarrior

customer_reviews.title: A very good phone
customer_reviews.text: Very good phone part (Nokia knows the job), excellent battery life, beautiful (small) screen, support 64GB micro card. Windows phone is a good system but apps are limited and some cross platforms apps (laptop, iOS, Androïd) are not present (yet ?) on Windows phone. Check carefully what your needs are. For example, you have Evernote and LastPass but not mSecure and Dashlane. Some specific apps like Chronos calendar are very good. On screen keyboard could be better. A lot of Nokia specific apps for Photos are not useful on that small unit.
customer_reviews.author: Papinet

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but mediocre OS
customer_reviews.text: Solid quality, very forgiving and SD card is great. The issue is the OS which is playing catch-up with Android and is limited, there's not even a data counter in the store. If you're not a heavy smartphone user it's simplicity may be even an advantage, but if you want to do some productivity work like sync calendar from Outlook not via Sky-Drive (restricted in many companies) or upload something to Youtube it's a pain. I also strongly dislike the magnifying button that defaults to Bing, it is very annoying and cannot be changed to a real search engine.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Handmann

customer_reviews.title: I am big Nokia fan so my review might not be fair... :-)
customer_reviews.text: I am big Nokia fan so my review might not be fair... :-) This phone has everything that is needed from the phone. Operating system is fast and mostly reliable, it froze only twice during over 6 months that I have it. You don't have as many apps as for android but if you don't use many of them then it does not matter as much. There is no Radio integrated into the phone so if you need it this phone is not for you. If I could I would gave it 4.5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Smigacze

customer_reviews.title: excellent phone
customer_reviews.text: I used Nokia many years but moved to samsung galaxy to have my smartphone Was glad to come back and check the new lumia 620 It is with me over a week a I love it Excellent screen, good camera, good sound, fast and nice and the right size not too big It took me few hours to get to know the new software but now it works perfect All in all very good phone and I am glad that Nokia is back
customer_reviews.author: Yuval

customer_reviews.title: Bad Device
customer_reviews.text: This device arrived in a timely manor, however, the sound was messed up. It was really muffled... I had to send it back. I did try playing around with it before I sent it back. It had a nice speaker phone, and it was a nice product for the price. I actually didn't mind the windows aspect of the phone. I wish I would have been able to keep it to play with it more.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lemmon

customer_reviews.title: Love Phone and the Windows OS
customer_reviews.text: Phone feels sturdily built and has good battery life (I've been able to have it run for 2 days straight without a charge). 5 mp camera takes photos and videos well enough to suit me fine. Runs Windows Phone 8.0 OS well. OS is fast and easy to use. Note: Phone uses MicroSIM card. If you have a MiniSIM, you might have to trim it down to fit into the phone. Other than that, the phone is reliable and has enough of an app selection to keep up with other smartphones. Good smartphone for first time users. Ordered from SHOPEBEST and phone came new with all working parts ahead of schedule. Virtually no complaints. Overall, I'm satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Willis

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased from: HassleFreeCell Shipping speed was on great, arrived in a well packaged envelope protecting the phone box. Downside: since it is an international unlocked phone, I did not see a reason for them opening the phone box. Nevertheless the phone is working great. No issues here.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Thanks in advance Best Regards, Shezareth Diaz
customer_reviews.text: I write because i have a problem with my cellphone NOKIA LUMIA 620. I received the product but the button on/off, camera and volume does not work. Even, the phone cell does not work to touch. Only i have 3 days with this product. Could you please inform me how i can proceed with this? Do you have any process for reimbursement or replacement of the phone? I need your help pls. Thanks in advance Best Regards, Shezareth Diaz
customer_reviews.author: SHEZARETH DIAZ

customer_reviews.title: it is a good phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone was very responsive. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is shortly after receiving it was the loudspeaker stop working properly but the loudspeaker was easily replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandros M. Collie

customer_reviews.title: Phone met my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: The phone is working well. I like the fact that it has a SIM card. The features met my expectation.
customer_reviews.author: Dotse Oyarebu

customer_reviews.title: Love the phone
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone. It fits very well in my hand. The phone operates on Windows 8 and works smoothly, quickly, and well above my expectations. The interface is stunning. I love the level of customization available to me to set up all apps/tiles in the way that suits my needs the best. Would definitely recommed it to all who are looking for not-too-expensive smartphone.
customer_reviews.author: P. Kmiec

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, one of the cheapest Lumia-s, but serves the purpose. If you want good camera for photos, look for a more expensive one, but otherwise this is a great phone for the price.
customer_reviews.author: AYM

customer_reviews.title: I don't read Chinese
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine, as it was described, However, I still haven't been able to set it up, as it is in Finnish on the phone and Chinese on the manual! A one-page typed directions would be helpful....
customer_reviews.author: Katplus50

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed :(
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cellphone and it wasnt unlocked, it request a code when I insert the simcard. Also, the battery or the charger doesnt work!!!, so i dont even know if the phone itself works. I live outside the US and the cellphone came to me to late to do a formal complaint, so I seriusly dont recommend buy from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Vida Luz Arista

customer_reviews.title: I am very unsatisfied about this phone, I purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very unsatisfied about this phone, I purchased this phone for international use , phone getting hot and the battery don't last 10 mn ,I had to buy another battery ,I suggest ppl to buy phone else where not in amazon cause you are not guarantee at all 👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thank for the return policy. The power button did not work. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my Nokia 620
customer_reviews.text: I've quite enjoyed my Nokia so far. It has a full turn by turn GPS app provided by Nokia which I wasn't expecting which I've found very useful. Of note, if you do plan to use the GPS app, expect the battery to die quicker. I needed to get a car adapter to power the phone while using it so that my battery stayed full.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pitcher

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone is great. I will recomend to anyone that is looking for a good phone at a great price.

customer_reviews.title: faulty device
customer_reviews.text: I received the nokia lumia 620 and it was fine, happy with my purchase until a few weeks after (less than a month) the device battery died and it refused to charge and would not turn on . I had to send it back to the seller for a full refund I was very disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice product, working fast, with nice applications for me, but unfortunatelly with no software for internet banking in Venezuela

customer_reviews.title: Too easy to break:(
customer_reviews.text: Dropped it from a two feet high and the screen broke, too sad that I have been using it for only one month:(

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I am not a phone person but I do love this phone. It is really easy to use. I haven't encountered any problems so far. It's affordable, the camera takes good pics not professional but good enough for me.

customer_reviews.title: GOOD
customer_reviews.text: I choose the rating i did because i feel that the phone does GREAT for its cost. I live in The Caribbean and the phone did come to The Bahamas locked. But i called the people i got it from and they unlocked it for me over the phone. Amazing Seller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great although the when you put the phone on speaker phone you can hear but they can't hear you.

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it, i was looking for a good Smartphone and a razonable price and i found it. A good battery duration, The only thing that i found a bit strange was the music Player but its a matter of getting used to it. I recommend it

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is Just awesomee!!!!! We have had it for more than a month now. Maybe two but the features are really good. Something I would def recommend.

customer_reviews.title: To Cloudy For Me
customer_reviews.text: Windows Phone 8 was not the OS for me. I switched back to iOS after having this phone. Not being able to control the applications/OS Updates on the phone via a desktop client was a big draw back.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Carlson

customer_reviews.title: I can not unlock my phone
customer_reviews.text: I can not unlock the phone because the EMAI that comes with the unlock code is not the same EMAI the phone. would please send me the unlock code for the phone...

customer_reviews.title: 6 months since I've bought this phone and the speaker ...
customer_reviews.text: 6 months since I've bought this phone and the speaker phone doesn't work. Also, the camera stops working frequently... Not a worthy buy...

customer_reviews.title: Really good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the quality of this phone. It's responsive, the screen looks great and whole package feels solid.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, quick phone
customer_reviews.text: W8 works properly, nice camera. All the most usefull apps are in the store. Whatsapp is the only thing I use a lot and I'm not happy with. Hope they'll upgrade it with a version that works better with W8.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Castro

customer_reviews.title: Excelent product good timing
customer_reviews.text: Excelent product good timing Works perfectly in Colombia. Good size and weight. Great camera and best shot works just fine

customer_reviews.title: pretty good cellphone
customer_reviews.text: everything is perfect, such as fluent system and nokia map, except speaker is a little strong with some cici noise despite low stage of sound.
customer_reviews.author: PS Li

customer_reviews.title: Very good cell phone a level of hardware in compare with ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good cell phone a level of hardware in compare with the price, The SO is very nice to, very intuitive and easy manage.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to hold off for a more expensive phone and then I decided to purchase this phone. I feel like I just bought a expensive phone with the quality of the phone. The phone functions great, I actually really like windows phone. The phone is small, sleek, and feels great. I am really happy with my purchase, I got a great phone and I didn't have to spend a ton of money on it. I have it hooked up with T-Mobile and everything is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Oscar

customer_reviews.title: A nice smart phone at this price
customer_reviews.text: I got this window phone last month as a replacement for my old one. It runs smoothly and has enough apps. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: panwang

customer_reviews.title: Great Mobile
customer_reviews.text: Great product. First time with Windows Phone and it's really good, clean and simple. Won't regret this purchase, i'm really happy.

customer_reviews.title: Cellphone locked
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem with this cellphone. I am from Argentina, I bought you this cellphone but when I put my sim card it asks me for a pin number. That means that is locked?
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: It is ok
customer_reviews.text: there is no charger for this phone, also, it took very long time to charge the phone via the connection to PC.
customer_reviews.author: Jianhua Li

customer_reviews.title: Excellente device.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Smartphone. Windows Phone Works excellent in this phone. Easy to use and fast. 3G bands 850/900/1900/2100. There is only one problem for latin american customers: This phone don't have spanish, you must use it in english.
customer_reviews.author: Jeickson Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Overall well but seems to be fake
customer_reviews.text: Overall the phone works well. The battery is fake. It does not have the necessary attachments, e.g. the one with laser printing. The package and the contents really look weird.
customer_reviews.author: Zeno

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone and Price
customer_reviews.text: Really nice phone and with the addition of a TMobile sim card ($100 per year for talk and text) this phone is a cheap way to get a smart phone. I turned off the data and only use WiFi only and have no problems checking email and using web apps The only draw back I have found is the lack of a radio, my wife's WinPhone has one.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D.H. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Is this the last of the pocket-sized mobile devices?
customer_reviews.text: It replaced another 620 which would restart itself because the battery inside was loose. It started after I accidentally dropped it. However, this new unit also restarts itself for even the smallest of bumps. I tried replacing the back of the case - hold the battery more securely - to no avail. This unit may be faulty from the factory. I am planning to get a more rugged model without the removable back and battery.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: amazing phone at great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Lumia 620 from FGS Trading. As they promised, the phone was unlocked, and most importantly unbranded. No carrier logos, start screens, or software. This phone even came with the Windows Phone 8 GDR 2 update, which is just being rolled out. I also bought a Lumia 520 from FGS Trading a few weeks ago. Excellent service and prices, and no problems or bait and switch. The Nokia Lumia 620 has a very bright and clear screen, excellent call quality, and quality construction. Windows Phone 8 is a great OS. I strongly recommend this product, and this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: One bad thing....
customer_reviews.text: Everything w/ this phone is great except the phone came w/ aftermarket battery, die w/in 8 months. Did bought 2 OEM Replacement through AMAZON. Roughly 15 bucks for both Batteries. I did update this phone to Window 8.1 as a Window App Developer, LOVE IT SO MUCH. 2+ years will get Windows 9 phone, long wait.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Huang

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and the phone was in mint condition. The package seemed as if it may have been opened since the security-tape on the box was cut. The phone included both US and non-US adapters. The phone is great. I wished I could upgrade to WP8.1 .. have yet to see.
customer_reviews.author: Malhar Shah

customer_reviews.title: Exeeds every expectation
customer_reviews.text: This phone is the best value for your buck. Runs like a charm, Windows Phone 8 is wonderful and it DOES have the quality and quantity of apps, don't fall for the anti Microsoft hype. The vendor shipped it on time and I had no trouble with the delivery. All in all, one of the best buys I have ever made, on anything!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Manuel García de Paredes

customer_reviews.title: I like this phone
customer_reviews.text: I have had this phone for 3 months and it has been working flawlessly. The interface is simple and slick. I love that it comes with Nokia Transit which is by far the most useful app for me - I have been using public transport a lot more thanks to this app. The only problem is the lack of a native file system on the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Pace

customer_reviews.title: Love the phone
customer_reviews.text: It is incredible phone, great audio quality, speaker phone is LOUD and wifi sensor works in my big house. Nokia sure knows how to make hardware. Same size as iPhone 4 (my wife has iPhone 4), but comes unlocked and for half the price. With Windows Phone gaining apps everyday, this is a steal at the price. 512 MB of RAM is great. Although I experience some freezes sometimes when too many apps are open, the phone is awesome including battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Annonymous

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: As described, but can't use a regular US phone chip.
customer_reviews.author: Antigone Trivelals

customer_reviews.title: smooth and stable
customer_reviews.text: Very good design and manufacturing. Considering the price, you get 2 cameras, NFC and a good resolution screen. With the tic-toc of engineering changing technology every 6-8 months, do you really need a $700 phone? For less than a third of that, you get a latest version of WinPhone 8 with updates, free Office, free offline and updated maps (with Garmin, you have to pay every year for the exact same thing).
customer_reviews.author: Freezerburn

customer_reviews.title: Good phone!
customer_reviews.text: Eeasy to use, very good camera, very good signal reception, the screen is very bright and the battery has a good life too!
customer_reviews.author: Paulo P. Silva Prado

customer_reviews.title: Light and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! Sleek small and light. Only caveat is once you do get used to a bigger screen it might be hard to go back to this. But definitely a bang for your buck !
customer_reviews.author: Pranav Kukreja

customer_reviews.title: Careful
customer_reviews.text: This phone came llcked to Telus, it is not factory unlocked as implied. My sim does not function in the phone and an error message askingnfor an unlock code came up.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Knight

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone. Bought one for my wife and now think about get rid of my old android lg device. I love pre-installed navigator, superfast gps, camera and city lens.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitry

customer_reviews.title: Moneys worth
customer_reviews.text: For the price it comes at, its well worth the purchase. Has a great camera, WP8 runs amazingly smooth, and the build and screen quality are simply top notch, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Syn

customer_reviews.title: thanks, alot
customer_reviews.text: it's good thanks I really like my new phone and love it. but the battery is weak,and I must but another battery for exchange in my daytime,
customer_reviews.author: fred

customer_reviews.title: Best windows smart phone in this price range...
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with its design, screen resolution, user friendliness, Application like Word, Excel, One Note, Internet Explorer etc... Fantastic touch screen experience ever...
customer_reviews.author: Rakesh

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: This is my first smartphone and so far it has been awesome. I love the download maps feature on this phone.
customer_reviews.author: iss2341

customer_reviews.title: Amaizing phone!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone! It is compact, fits in my pocket, yet powerful and delivers a lot for the price. Get it unlockek and use it in US, has great downloadable Nokia maps, no need to pay for data plan to use it as GPS device. Just get it. Update. The phone works great after two weeks of usage, updates are easy and sound quality is very good. Nokia GPS software is very good. The phone fits perfectly into a pocket and easy to hold - not too big and not too small.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: seal on the box was broken and battery missing
customer_reviews.text: cant use phone there was no battery in the box seal was broken and the user manual is in Spanish
customer_reviews.author: wesley moss

customer_reviews.title: It's all I was expected
customer_reviews.text: I love Nokia brand so I like this cell phone. At the begining the cell phone had problems with two of the side buttons, but the problem was already solved. It was really unlocked, no problems with the sim card I put in it. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was terrible
customer_reviews.text: The item received in time, but the packaging was awful, it was torn all over. The phone is actually very good for a 3G phone, but in comparison with a 4G phone it fades (yes, a cheaper phone is just going to be cheaper :) )
customer_reviews.author: L. V. Sampath

customer_reviews.title: excellent phone
customer_reviews.text: its secure and fine , i love this phone, enjoy so much , nokia its the best and this phone work excellent,in my country venezuelan with movistar digitel and movilnet
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Medina

product_meta.title: Nokia Lumia 620 Black Factory Unlocked Smartphone
product_meta.description: Cellular Band - Quad-Band 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 Mhz Cellular Band 3G - 850 / 900 / 1900 / 2100 Mhz
feature_bullets: Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T and T-Mobile as well as with GSM SIM cards (e.g. H20, Straight Talk, and select prepaid carriers). Unlocked cell phones will not work with CDMA Carriers like Sprint, Verizon, Boost or Virgin.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars113 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Other camera features: Primary Camera: 5 MP, 2592 x 1936 pixels, autofocus, LED flash|Secondary Camera: VGA
